Actions.ActionName: SET PARENT Folder to Choose Destination Folder From

Actions.Text:
use AppleScript version "2.4" -- Yosemite (10.10) or later
use scripting additions

property ptyScriptName : "Choose Destination Folder"
property ptyScriptVer : "1.1"
property ptyScriptDate : "2017-02-11"
property ptyScriptAuthor : "JMichaelTX"

(*
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
KM VARIABLES REQUIRED: (must be set before calling this script)
	• ParentFolder	| text	|	Default folder for Choose Folder Dialog
									Default: ~/Documents
	
KM VARIABLES SET: (by this script)
	• <none>
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~	
*)

try
	--~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
	
	tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to set defaultFolderPath to getvariable "MSF__ParentFolder"
	
	if defaultFolderPath = "" then
		set defaultFolderPath to path to documents folder as text
	else
		set defaultFolderPath to POSIX file defaultFolderPath
	end if
	set defaultFolderPath to defaultFolderPath as alias
	set destinationFolder to "[CANCELED]"
	
	set frontApp to path to frontmost application as text
	tell application frontApp
		# POSIX Path of the folder you're interested in.
		set destinationFolder to POSIX path of (choose folder with prompt ¬
			"Choose FOLDER to Move File To" default location defaultFolderPath)
	end tell -- frontApp
	
	set returnResults to destinationFolder
	
	--~~~~~~~~~~~~~ END TRY ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
	
on error errMsg number errNum
	
	if errNum = -128 then ## User Canceled
		set returnResults to "[USER_CANCELED]" & return & return ¬
			& "SCRIPT: " & ptyScriptName & "   Ver: " & ptyScriptVer
	else
		set returnResults to "[ERROR]" & return & return ¬
			& "SCRIPT: " & ptyScriptName & "   Ver: " & ptyScriptVer & return ¬
			& "Error Number: " & errNum & return ¬
			& errMsg
	end if
	
	
end try
--~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

--- RETURN THE RESULTS TO THE KM EXECUTE SCRIPT ACTION ---
return returnResults

Actions.Title: Confirm MOVE of Finder Selection
Actions.Text:
Click on "Continue", OR Press RETURN, if you want to MOVE all of the Items SELECTED in the FINDER to:

%Variable%MSF__DestinationFolder%

Actions.ActionName: MOVE Each Item in Finder Selection to Destination Folder
CHECK FOR ERROR IN LAST MOVE ACTION

ThenActions.Title: ~~~ ERROR in MOVE Action - Macro CANCELED ~~~
ThenActions.Prompt:

The attempt to move Finder Items to:
%Variable%DestinationFolder%
FAILED.

ERROR MSG from KM:

%Variable%MoveActionResult%

The following items in the Finder Selection:
%Variable%MSF__ResultsLog%

HAVE BEEN MOVED TO:
%Variable%MSF__DestinationFolder%

Actions.ActionName: SCRIPT:  DELETE All Variables with KMVarPrefix and in KMVars_To_Delete
Actions.Text:
tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"
	
	--- DELETE ALL KM VARIABLES WITH THIS PREFIX ---
	
	set prefixStr to getvariable "KMVarPrefix"
	
	if (prefixStr ≠ "") then
		set value of variables whose name starts with prefixStr to "%Delete%"
		--display notification "All KM Variables with PREFIX = '" & prefixStr & ¬
		--	"' have been deleted." with title "Keyboard Maestro Script"
	end if
	
	--- DELETE KM VARS IN THE VARIABLE "KMVars_To_Delete" ---
	
	set varsToDeleteList to paragraphs of (getvariable "KMVars_To_Delete")
	
	if (varsToDeleteList ≠ {}) then
		
		set varsToDeleteList to varsToDeleteList & {"KMVars_To_Delete"}
		
		repeat with oVar in varsToDeleteList
			setvariable (oVar as text) to "%Delete%"
		end repeat
		
		--display notification "All KM Variables in 'KMVars_To_Delete' have been deleted." with title "Keyboard Maestro Script"
		
	end if
	
end tell
